review: 목동 운동장 목동운동장에는 야구장, 종합운동장, 아이스링크, 실내 사격장등이 위치해있습니다. 이제 프로야구는 볼수 없지만 실탄 사격이나 아이스 스케이팅을 하기에 좋은곳입니다.
review_en: Mokdong Stadium Mokdong Stadium has a baseball stadium, a general stadium, an ice rink, and an indoor shooting range. Now you can't see professional baseball, but it's a good place to shoot live bullets or ice skating.

review: 프로야구는 안하지만 조금있으면 괜찮아질곳 지금은 프로야구를 하지않지만 몇년지나면 더좋은구장으로 변신할듯합니다. 인근에는 안양천이 있어 산책하기좋으며 교통편은 좋은편이아닙니다.
review_en: I don't play professional baseball, but I will be fine soon. I don't play professional baseball now, but I think I will turn into a better stadium in a few years. There is Anyangcheon Stream nearby, so it is good to take a walk and it is not good for transportation.

review: 프로야구도 끝~~ 5단지 주민에겐 고역이었겠지만 개인적으로 재작년까지 야구보러 종종 가고 너무 좋았는데 더이상 여기서 관람 안되서 아쉽다~ 아이스링크장 옆에 있는데도 갈만함.
review_en: Professional baseball is over~~ It must have been hard for the residents of complex 5, but I personally went to watch baseball until 2 years ago and it was so nice, but I'm sad that I can't watch it anymore. It's worth visiting even though it's next to the ice rink.

review: 히어로즈는 이제 고척으로 고척 돔 경기장이 생기기 전까진 넥센의 보금자리였지만, 이젠 더이상 이곳에서 1군 경기는 열리지 않습니다. 어느덧 역사의 한 페이지가 되었네요.
review_en: The Heroes used to be the home of Nexen until Gocheok Dome Stadium was built in Gocheok, but now the first division game is no longer held here. It's already become a page in history.

review: 주변이 이쁜곳.. 작년까지는 봄부터 프로야구를 하던 곳입니다 너무 주택가 근처에 있어서 밤이면 시끄럽기도 했지만 지금은 조용해요 안양천변 근처라 조금만 나오면 요즘시기이 벚꽃이 아름답게 피어있네요
review_en: It's pretty around here. Until last year, we've been playing professional baseball since spring. It was so close to the residential area that it was noisy at night, but now it's quiet. It's near Anyang stream, so cherry blossoms are blooming beautifully these days.

review: 넥센이 홈구장으로 사용한 목동구장 2015년까지 넥센히어로즈가 홈구장으로 사용한 곳입니다. 경기장이 5호선과 가까워서 접근성은 좋지만 30년 넘은 구장이라 시설적인 부분은 아쉽네요
review_en: Mokdong Stadium, which was used by Nexen as a home stadium, was used by Nexen Heroes as a home stadium until 2015. The stadium is close to line 5, so it's accessible, but it's over 30 years old, so I'm sorry about the facilities.

review: 프로야구경기를 하기엔 모자르는 구장 프로야구와 고교야구가 열리는 야구장입니다. 대중교통으로 접근성이 떨어지는 야구장입니다. 5호선 지하철역 오목교역이있지만 도보로 꽤 걸리는 곳입니다.
review_en: It is not enough to play a professional baseball game. It is a baseball stadium where professional baseball and high school baseball are held. It is a baseball stadium that is not accessible by public transportation. There is Omok Trading Station at subway station No. 5, but it takes a long walk.

review: 대중교통으로는 접근성이 좋지 않지만 대중교통으로는 접근성이 좋지 않지만 아이들 방학때 한번씩 갑니다. 아이스링크에서 스케이트 강습도 있구요
review_en: It's not very accessible by public transportation, but it's not very accessible by public transportation, but children go once during their vacation. There's skating lessons at the ice rink.
